goal.en: Students will be able to apply interactional analyses to learner data.
goal.ch: 學生將運用第二語言習得理論分析學習者的互動。

content.en: “This course introduces second language acquisition (SLA) theory and research. This course aims to help students understand current approaches to the study of SLA. We will discuss the nature of language learning, variables influencing SLA (e.g., linguistic, cognitive, and sociocultural), and the relationship between SLA theory and pedagogy in second and foreign language contexts. Class lectures will focus on how language is learned within second and foreign language contexts, with some attention to first language studies. Students will be able to apply interactional analyses to learner data.“
